meanings.def: a piece of software that you can download to a device such as a smartphone or tablet, for example to look up information or to play a game
examples: You first need to install the app on your device.
Have you got the dictionary app on your phone?
Gaming today is all about mobile app downloads.
The app is available on/in the app store.

meanings.def: a program designed to do a particular job; a piece of software
